# serverChallenge

**Type Property**

Specifies a nonce to include in the secure server playback context (SPC) to prevent replay attacks.

## Declaration

```swift
static let serverChallenge: AVContentKeySessionServerPlaybackContextOption
```

## Discussion

Specify this value as an 8-byte [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSData] object. If you don’t specify a value for this key, the system assumes a default server challenge of `0`.

## Server playback context options

- **protocolVersions**: Specifies the versions of the content protection protocols supported by the application.
